item.title: AR - MaoXiaoJiu
item.description:
Welcome to AR - MaoXiaoJiu, an innovative mobile application that leverages Augmented Reality technology to provide you with a novel visual experience and interactivity fun. With AR - MaoXiaoJiu, you can see our virtual characters - MaoXiaojiu - jump around and play in your Real-world environment like they’re right beside you.

This project attempts to merge the virtual with reality and enrich user experiences with Augmented Reality. It is also a test of the USD pipeline in Apple ARKit that all assets (characters and animations) used in this project are in USD format.

My contributions to this project are:

  • Project coordination.
  • Full stack development.
  • Implement USD pipeline in ARKit, Maya, and Houdini.
